extendedInfo.description: For more details, check our new website:http://www.android-weather.com***NEW*** GEOGRAPHICAL MAP OF LOCATIONS***NEW*** ADD ANY LOCATION ON EARTH FROM MAP, CUSTOM LOCATION NAME***NEW*** POCKET CHANGE FREE GIFTS AND FREE APPS FOR DOWNLOAD***NEW*** WEATHER ALERTS***NEW*** Themes Unlocker - unlocks and use all themes for FREE !***NEW*** Themes Upload - create and share your own theme with other users !*** NEW HOURLY FORECASTS ***Get the latest current conditions, forecasts, weather charts, maps, webcams and more with largest network of professional weather stations all over the world in a great looking style!FEATURES, or what makes this a FULL PACKAGE:========CORE FUNCTIONALITY:- Live and hourly detailed local weather conditions and forecasts- Millions! of locations around the world- Exact dynamic and automated current location search with 'My Location' functionality- 6 desktop weather widgets with (Flip Clock 4x2, Forecast 4x2, large Widget 4x2, Forecast 4x1, Clock 4x1, Mini 1x1)- Notification bar icon witch temperature and weather details*- Up to 10 active locations- Weather Alerts in USA- Geographical map of locations- Dual Clock â select from System, GMT or Location time- Moon phase, Sunrise, Sunset- App Hints screensCOOL FEATURES:- Live Webcams for every location to see the real weather conditions (largest webcams network)- Forecast Charts- Weather Forecast Maps for precipitation, clouds, temperatures and wind (also in HD available)*- Choose weather data provider which fits your location best (WeatherBug, OpenWeatherMap or YR.NO)- PocketChange integrated - get apps and goods for free, simply by using our appMAKE YOUR APPLICATION UNIQUE:- THEMES - customize your app by one click or create your own !- Fully graphical customizable (font types, backgrounds, colors, text outline â¦)- Fully customizable app settings (units, startup, updates, notification barâ¦)OTHER USEFUL ATTRIBUTES:- One of the best battery consumption application on the Market- Quick access to your default clock and calendar applications- Cached weather data for offline viewing- Easy use and high-impact visual eye candy views- Broad OS compatibility: Android 1.6+, QVGA, WQVGA400/432, HVGA, WVGA800/854And there is more to come, we develop and improve our app continuously.If you like Weather Services-RATE US. Thank you and enjoy!IMPORTANT=========If you are experiencing any issues, please make sure your data connectivity is up & running. Vast majority of our low ratings are because of local issues, please contact us and let us help you first:Contact: support@android-weather.comRelease notes:=============v2.7.2Fixed: Problems with WB data providerFixed: Problems with 'Locations' screen and adding locations from the mapv2.7.1Fixed: F/C for some locations with WeatherBug provider after update to v2.7Added: More location names directly on google map while adding new locationsv2.7Added: More locations on Google maps - select (insert new) location from the map.Fixed: Problem with removing the first locationFixed: Minimum and maximum temperatures for current day with YR.no data provider fixedOther small fixes.v2.6Added: - New weather data provider with hourly forecast (now total of 3 diffrent providers available)- New locations list (summary) window design with extended menu- Search for location directly from the google map- New improved tutorial (hint) screens- Offline mode - real condition also when device is offline- Themes - new layout- Themes - landscape modeFixed: - Locations removing bug fixed- Beaufort speed indicator on forecast screen fixed- Menu buttons for landscape mode fixed...and moreOlder release notes removed...(v2.5.4)-(v1.0)* we provide Forecast Maps, which are not Live Radars, as some may exchange this expression. Live Radars are being developed and will come soon

reviews.title: Every in accurate
reviews.comment: This app found the temp range to be way off compared to other weather apps I have this one read 15 to 20 degrees higher than what the temp is outside
reviews.author: Thomas Deutschman

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Hope it may be added \'refresh\' symbol/button on the widget
reviews.author: Edy Edy

reviews.title: Better options elsewhere
reviews.comment: This app in its free version offers only the single initial forecast screen. All other maps - weekly temps, cloudiness, etc. - are in fact just big banners that say \"pro version only\". And the price of the pro version is too high, given that other good apps offer the same functionality for less.
reviews.author: Mark Alexander

reviews.title: Used to love this
reviews.comment: I updated to this new version and it crashes all the time. Even when just running in the background. I get popup saying it crashed.
reviews.author: Jack Dawson

reviews.title: Worng weather
reviews.comment: Worng weather show if show rain but sun shine no rain
reviews.author: abdul wwaheed

reviews.title: Make it Flip..
reviews.comment: This is my favorite weather clock but I wonder why it can\'t flip the clock. Please, make the clock flip. It would be rated 5 by everyone right from the moment the flip is added to the clock, I am sure. Thanks for the awesome product...
reviews.author: Ali Raza Agha

reviews.title: Good apps
reviews.comment: Its almost shows the correct weather condition. But its not show the current location.. Please fix it
reviews.author: mani g
